title: Exploring Sociocultural Heritage Through Museum Game-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of history and cultural heritage, digital device usage proficiency
context.additional_context: Students access the LMS asynchronously via personal devices, utilizing virtual museum exhibits and gamified learning modules. Online collaboration tools and discussion boards are provided to promote social interaction.

learning_goals: Students can analyze and explain the historical and social contexts of museum exhibits through game-based activities
Learners derive multi-layered interpretations of cultural heritage through communication with peers while performing collaboration-based game tasks
Through project-based assessment, learners create creative outputs applying in-game acquired knowledge to actual cultural heritage preservation strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
